headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 3X GTA$ and RP on Till Death Do Us Part and Shotgun Wedding
content:
Nothing’s more romantic than pairing up and fighting for your life to be the last couple standing in Till Death Do Us Part.

Stand by your partner to get health benefits and fight off any other jealous paramours to earn Triple Rewards, all week long.

Plus, relationships are all about intimacy — the kind fostered during close-range shootouts right outside the church in Paleto Bay. Speak now or forever hold your peace, as Shotgun Wedding is also dishing out 3X GTA$ and RP through February 15.
